Topology_graphs.misc.cog_arrow module

class CoBeLRL.spatial_representations.topology_graphs.misc.cog_arrow.CogArrow(parent=None, **opts)

Bases: pyqtgraph.graphicsItems.ArrowItem.ArrowItem

Helper class for the visualization of the topology graph.It constructs a centered arrow pointing in a dedicated direction, inherited from ‘ArrowItem’

setData(x, y, angle)

Set the position and direction of the arrow

Parameters

  • x – x position of the arrow’s center

  • y – y position of the arrow’s center

  • angle – the orientation of the arrow

Returns

None
